mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.title, r.content, r.image, r.rating, r.view, i.name AS productName, i.image AS productImage, i.price AS productPrice FROM review r JOIN item i ON r.item_id = i.item_id WHERE r.review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET view = view + 1 WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.item_id AS itemId, r.user_id AS userId, r.rating, r.title, r.content, r.image, r.view, r.is_hidden AS isHidden, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.updated_at AS updatedAt, i.name AS productName, i.image AS productImage, i.price AS productPrice FROM review r JOIN item i ON r.item_id = i.item_id WHERE r.is_hidden = FALSE ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
